data.name: Lingua Fleur: Lily Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Lingua Fleur: Lily soundtrack album
The content includes the following:

Game music 12 songs, format:
1. MP3 (320K) with Digital music collection cover.
2. WAV

All music is specially adjusted for appreciation. (Game version is more Smooth, avoid masking vocals)

List of tracks:
01.Les Arbres
02.Du Soleil
03.Du Soleil(piano)
04.Leurs Branches
05.En Pleurant
06.Believe Me
07.Believe_Me(without Guitar)
08.Icy Feeling
09.En Frémissant
10.Aux Frissons
11.La Robe
12.Il Effleure

*the OST data is under the under the installation path.

data.short_description: Lingua Fleur: Lily soundtrack album. 12 songs with specially adjusted for appreciation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
